name: Fix my Mix
description:
Controls

To Move - WASD

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

This is a submission for the 72 Global GameJam 2020! 

The theme was "Repair" 

In this game, you are a DJ and you must kill the glitch enemies that keep on trying to destroy your mixtape. You must fix your mix!

Animation/Art - Giacomo Autili

Art Coordinator and UI - Cristian HZI

Sound Design - Vladimir Cazacu

Everything else by Teo Dragon, Daniel Pandele, Andrei Zi Zhen Cretu
